How do you get rid of the washed out colors? The info file provided isn't very helpful. I've tried loading the ffdshow preference files, but no matter what video player I use (VLC, Media Player Classic, Windows Media Player) the colors stay the same. Specifically telling ffdshow to load when using those players makes no difference, either.

I just figured out how you can very easily fix the color saturation issue in VLC.

Go to:
Preferences -> Video
Uncheck "Use hardware YUV->RGB conversions"

It should make a negligible difference in CPU usage; I only saw 5% more CPU usage on my measly Athlon 64 x2 at 1GHz!
Take note that you still have to restart VLC after clicking the "Save" button for it to take effect.

Can't wait to marathon the whole season :) thanks for the upload, it's gonna be much better than youtube. And it'll give me something to do when internet isn't available to me...

WMP users can do this to fix the saturation issues:
Right-click on screen > Enhancements > Video Settings. Then slide the Saturation bar (bottom left) until you find your sweet spot.
Here's an example of what it looks like: i.imgur.com/Df4wT.jpg
